title: Problematic Teammates (Part 1)
body:
Problematic Teammates (Part 1)

After ending the call Evan sighed.

He was sure that now that Valery knew about the dark guild's plan, she will not sit idly by and watch them succeed.

But he also knew it is impossible to completely stop them and avoid casualties.

They don't know when will people of the dark guild will attack on the city. They also don't know how many members of the dark guild will attack the city or the place they will target.

Naphliam city is very big and it is not easy to look for them in such a short period of time.

Moreover, most of the hunters are currently preparing for the monster tide.

'Even though there is no way to completely stop them, the hunter association will be able to minimize the casualties if Valery informs them about the dark guild's plan' Evan thought and stopped thinking about it.

He is just a D+ rank hunter and there is nothing he can do in this situation.
